website_summaries.verdict: The Genius Kit from Osmo combines interactive technology with the time-proven techniques of child education. 5 different games will keep young players engaged for hours at a time.
pros: Very easy to download from app store, various skill levels available
Games encourage visual, auditory, and haptic learning
Includes original Osmo base (reflector and stand)
cons: Games are repetitive, not as engaging for older children

customer_reviews.title: A great go-to gift idea for friends and family.
customer_reviews.text: I bought OSMO for my nieces who were visiting for a month of summer and we've all been blown away! There are so many fun games for them to play and I don't feel guilty about giving them screen time. It's engaging, educational, super fun and often I ended up playing with them. I love seeing them get hands on learning and working together! We are buying another Genius Starter kit so they have it at their home as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and purchase!  Def worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Numbers is a great game. My 5 year old son loves it. The words game is just beginning to be his favorite and even I enjoy doing the shapes game with him. All in all a great buy. Very educational. And a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Roma Patel

customer_reviews.title: Too complicated for kids to enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Okay so you get an item which is a 5 dollar piece of plastic. After that you have to set up an account, download apps (while it tells you to buy additional $10 apps), and create an account. Next your kid will be able to play the games. They are incredibly complicated and confusing. You'd be better off buying a regular $5 app. This thing is too complicated for young kids to enjoy, and too simple for older kids. Biggest waste of money I have spent on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Channet Vallandigham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this for me 6 year old daughter. The possibilities with this tool are endless. We love the word game. It even allows you to add in your own customized words so you can have your little one study things like their classes weekly spelling words.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Awesome App -Very educational.
customer_reviews.text: Numbers is a great game. My 5 year old son loves it. The words game is just beginning to be his favorite and even I enjoy doing the shapes game with him. All in all a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Abu Paul

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Idea. Very creative app and kid magnet
customer_reviews.text: Awesome app. My kid loved it. Now he get his iPad for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Ajeeb Peter

customer_reviews.title: Missing subtraction
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit but we found there is no subtraction in numbers it has just counting adding and multiplication. I bought this for my 7 yr old son to learn subtraction easily but we disappointed rest of things good he enjoyed to play tangram. He had already Osmo mind racers two years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Srees

customer_reviews.title: Love this learning tool for all ages, even adults
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, at this point, my son and I are battling over who gets to use the Osmo. I’m more hooked on the numbers and he’s hooked on the tangram pieces. I just love when things are fun and educational. That’s how I grew up. I fell in live with learning through all the games I had. I wanted my children to experience that too, but it’s so difficult to find great material that’s up to date. This Osmo come SUPER close. I’d let him play this all day no problem. He’s learning and he thinks it’s all a game. Fooled him. Lol! Definitely buying for all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Risnis

customer_reviews.title: Better check your iPad size before you buy! This will not work with larger iPad Pro.
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing this for my kids for Christmas, I am probably just going to give it to the school. Osmo does not work with any of the larger iPads. Super disappointed and Osmo does not yet offer any compatible products with larger iPads. I will admit to being sucked in by just reading the product description that this works with iPads and not looking at the specific models but I think Osmo should consider also calling this out in their main product description page.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: You made my life a bit easier. You have my respect for that! 😀
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical at first but after a few days with one for my 4 YO, I ended up buying another osmo kit for my 8YO as well. The programming of the apps that go with the games is incredible!!! We loved the starter kit so much that we ended up buying a few other games as well. Given distance learning coming up in a few weeks when schools start- I predict, these games will be a daily occurrence in our household. Even the adults like to try their hand at the tangram, numbers and coding games. Well done OSMO!! You have a fan here. You made my life easier. You have my respect for that!
customer_reviews.author: Pluto's Review

customer_reviews.title: Great way for kids to learn
customer_reviews.text: First heard about Osmo at school, and how the kids enjoyed playing. So I decided to get one for home, and cannot believe I waited this long to get one. Osmo makes the best use of the iPad I have ever seen for kids. Love the Numbers game, and kids are enjoying Words and Masterpiece. Looking at some of the other Osmo games for Christmas. Great experience!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Koenig-Michal

customer_reviews.title: Educational for an older 5 year old.
customer_reviews.text: My oldest son is about to turn 6 and we purchased Osmo during Thanksgiving sales. Since it has arrived at our house, my boys love playing with it. My oldest son who is in Kindergarten has played the word game for a long period of time. He is learning to spell words and sounds. He also loves numbers and enjoys playing the fishing/numbers game. I love that he can sit down on his own and play for a long period of time. He is also learning words, sounds, and addition. We look forward to trying the other games.
customer_reviews.author: brikee

customer_reviews.title: Great product.... but product box crushed on corners!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my daughter loves it! However I will mention, the corners of the product box were all crushed. I believe this happened either due to poor shipping packaging and over filling the Amazon box or poor quality control before packing. Either way, it looks a little sloppy giving a gift with a damaged product box!
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Perez

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend buying this
customer_reviews.text: Not really worth the hype. My daughter got bored of it pretty soon as it’s very repetitive and after a point it’s boring.
customer_reviews.author: CUBIX

customer_reviews.title: A parents dream!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter loves this! I love how it challenges her in different way. We also bought the Disney princess drawing book and detective agency and we plan to buy the other ones as well! You will not regret buying this!
customer_reviews.author: RosieKay Spradlin

customer_reviews.title: Our 5 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: We got this system for our 5 year old - she loves it. Especially loves the tan gram and working through the learning path. She just started with the letters and numbers, so we are seeing growth. The masterpiece picture drawing is a little too much for her at the time, but very cool the way it works. Having some lag/trouble getting updates on the parent site - I feel this is the only weakness so far. The parent report does not show me all the activities ... still waiting for the time she spent on numbers
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Lowery, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids but takes some time to get used to.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 7 and enjoys using the learning games. It does take some time to get used to using. I thought the image was projected onto the board/writing surface, but it is not. You have to look at the screen and put together the puzzles or draw by looking at the screen and trying to follow the lines. It was a little confusing and may make it hard for younger children at first. My 12 year old enjoys it as well. We have another Osmo kit for drawing and she is always using that.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Fun and interactive
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this osmo set, in addition to the little genius. I find the games in this set to be more suitable for my 4 year old, as the games were more challenging and I felt there was more of an opportunity to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Choi

customer_reviews.title: Winner winner chicken dinner
customer_reviews.text: Osmo is worth it!! If your looking for a fun hands on way to help with your child’s education Osmo is it!! My girls are extremely excited to get on and play all while learning. Hands down worth the investment into your child’s education.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!!! TOTALLY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.text: If your a parent like me sick of watching your kiddos sitting around playing uneducational games on their tablet and watching videos that aren’t going to teach them a thing then this is for you! The Osmo is absolutely AMAZING! My daughter was so excited to watch her drawings come to life in this frozen story!!! Absolutely recommend to anyone with children!!! My daughter 6 1/2 years old and I was nervous this would be to young for her but it absolutely was not!!! I would give this 10 stars if I could!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old bought this with his own money, we merely ordered it for him. We had no idea what this product was. However, once it arrived, we realized this was more than just a game. And it keeps him entertained for hours!! And it's educational! And he wants more of it! And he has no idea he's learning at the same time!!! His older sister even got in on it, and she's usually too cool to even touch his stuff! It is definately worth every penny, for us at least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your little’s will thank you later
customer_reviews.text: I already see such a difference in my son’s vocabulary and critical thinking skills. I bought this for my Kindergartener when Quarentine happened because I needed something to keep his mind working. It was well worth every penny. I have actually purchased other games through this company as well because they give you like a store credit to spend on their website.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Delasancha

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Our oldest daughter (6 years old) LOVES using this. The games are fun and educational. She keeps asking to play it even when we don’t ask her to. It is definitely worth the money. It is helping our daughter learn more while having to go through school online. A lot of fun, very interesting, and educational . Perfect combo!
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Great for group of kids
customer_reviews.text: My kid saw this item from her friends house, and had a great fun. Then I bought for her, she just played for a short time. It is fun learning tool for group of kids, probably not that much for only one kid
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Helped keep my child entertained & Engaged
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep my kiddo busy and engaged over summer break during a pandemic. She is 8 years old, kept her mostly entertained but once they finish all the activities you need to purchase different packs which can get pricey. Was a good purchase, nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Learning made into so much fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old nephew for Christmas and he loves it. He enjoys playing with all the sections, but his favorite is the tanagram. He also enjoys the Newton block. His inquisitive nature is peaked and has enjoyed hours playing and learning physics. It’s easy to follow and put together. Best gift ever.
customer_reviews.author: Sykiatree

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to set up and out dates tech to quickly
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Malach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect integrated learning-game system!
customer_reviews.text: Our kindergartener is using the Osmo Genius starter kit to expand his classroom knowledge to our home. The games are educational and he is eager to use the Osmo whereas traditional letter/spelling workbooks were a chore. He can do most without little parent help but we love seeing what he’s doing too. I would recommend this for any pre-school or kindergarten bound child and can’t wait to see how he continues to use the Osmo.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Galgovich

customer_reviews.title: Nice but may not keep child's interest for long
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to set up and our 5 year was really into it for the first week and half maybe. Then he just moved on to other things. The games seem challenging but he seemed to want more after a while. Not a complete failure, who knows... he may want to play with it again soon.
customer_reviews.author: AABT

customer_reviews.title: Great hands on fun and screen time
customer_reviews.text: Great for home schooling! Kids are engaged and working with their hands while they can interact with iPad. The pieces are well made and design with storage system. The app makes it Engaging for 9 and 5 yr olds. My kids especially like tangram. Best of both worlds
customer_reviews.author: MMC

customer_reviews.title: What a great teaching tool!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is curious 5 year old who is excited by learning and her mom is a teacher. Mom really limits entertainment only screen time. The Osmo is the perfect combination to satisfy both. What a great teaching tool in a format that uses digital the technology to make learning fun and rewarding.
customer_reviews.author: Grampa D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Whoever created this did an amazing job. Ordered this for my son for Christmas and He can not stop playing it! He loves to draw with the monster! I will definitely be buying the other games to go with this! Perfect! Also, my son is 9 but on the autism spectrum and he loves it! Thank you OSMO!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Tavenner

customer_reviews.title: A must!
customer_reviews.text: The girls love it!!! They haven’t stopped playing since they opened the box. Very educational and very hands on.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE Osmo!
customer_reviews.text: We love this system and all the games that come with it. All of the movable pieces come in perfect little containers that all stack together. The games are fun and interactive. The genius starter kit is now apart of our daily homeschool routine.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S. McCreary

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great value. This product was able to give me exactly what I wanted out of it. It was able to do this without causing any concern and overall made me happy. I am a happy consumer and will trust this seller from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Great interaction. Kid doesn't realize he is learning
customer_reviews.text: Great product. There are some items that you know you’ll never regret buying. And this is one of them. My kid loves it. I love watching him play with it and see him get lost in the games while learning.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Osmo is our favorite
customer_reviews.text: We love osmo and it really encourages children to learn while having fun. It's great for our homeschool days. My kids enjoy numbers, puzzles, drawing and reading. We hope to add more games too. Very convenient and easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly II

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son but because of online learning he didn’t want it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON BENNETT

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this! And most importantly my 8 year old son loves it. He’s picky about electronics since we are not gamers. But he’s struggling in math and he can’t put this down. I never thought I would be happy about him playing a video game.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a present for my daughter for Hanukkah. She loves this, absolutely loves it. With every milestone she feels like a million bucks. It was worth every penny and we hope to add more to our set shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Just_ilanam

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids age 5 and under
customer_reviews.text: The value was great for this. It came with the osmo board and everything you need. My kids really enjoy it. There’s different levels to make it challenging for them. It’s a must have
customer_reviews.author: Violetteland

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Christmas gift for my nephew (4), and nieces (6 and 7). My nephew loves the shapes, my nieces love the spelling being a challenge. Very easy to set up and use. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erias

customer_reviews.title: Great distraction from non educational activities
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my granddaughter and she loves it!! Keeps her entertained and coming back for more. I wanted something that would pull her from UTube, and now she spends more time on this. Best purchase ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Pura Vida

customer_reviews.title: Great interactive learning/coding system
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed with the Osmo system. My 4 year old loves this and is learning so much it, is amazing! It was recommended to us by her preschool and I feel this is the best Christmas present I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: sporter

customer_reviews.title: Great educational system
customer_reviews.text: We got a number of the OSMO games at Christmas when the games were on sale. My 5 year old son loves each of the games. It's a great way for him to learn and I can direct him towards learning activities on the iPad rather than other electronic games.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Doran

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this product, we were first introduced to it years ago at a prior elementary school. I love that we were able to load the programs onto more than 1 device. Only downside I would have to say, I didn't like having to download each game separately for each device. If there was a way to auto download all apps contained within this program at one time, I would love this even. more. But, the games themselves are great, educational and graphics are fun for kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love this as much as my kid!
customer_reviews.text: Love Osmo! My son absolutely loves his Osmo starter pack. He enjoyed playing/learning so much we had to ask for 3 more Osmo games for his birthday! And it’s fun for adults too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for I saw my friend’s kids use it. But my daughter doesn’t like to use it very much. It is a little bit expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Angie li

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My six-year-old son really enjoys playing with us. It makes math and spelling, feel more like a game instead of a chore. Time will tell if he’s really learning that much but it’s better than the alternative tablet games
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great blend of online and Hands on.
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids,3 and 5, love this thing. I like that it combines the iPad....that they love....and hands on, moving physical letters and numbers. Amazing use of technology.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Tricks kids into learning!!
customer_reviews.text: The kids think of it as a video game, as a parent I see a fun learning activity. The apps are free to download and can be used by a wide variety of ages and abilities.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Check the iPad you have first!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty bummed about this one. It shows it’s iPad compatible. But I guess the iPad Pro 11in isn’t! My little girl was so sad. Why make a product that is so new that it won’t work with a certain size iPad? Suggest looking at what it’s compatible before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Although this is not cheap and the app setup could be more intuitive, there is so much fun once you get it up and running. Kids are able to interact with the games easily with physical pieces of tiles. Games are very responsive and my 5 year old understands the gameplay right away. It is a really good learning tool!
customer_reviews.author: Rabi

customer_reviews.title: It was fun,educational and perfect gifts for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it! It was a surprise gift from the gp's. They love it so much and im happy that they are learning while theyre having fun!
customer_reviews.author: Edsn Tmsn

customer_reviews.title: It's a great hit
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr and 5yr enjoy it very much. I am pleased with the program. It requires them to use their brain. They can practice spelling and math in different ways. They have so much fun with them. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KaHaMaMa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sauce
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our kid. She loves it. It’s easy to use and we got it on sale! Fantastic tool for beginner learners. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brodginskee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter asked for this kit for Christmas because she saw it somewhere. Not until we started researching, realized how much it can do and all the additions you can get. It has definitely been the most favorite educational game she received this Christmas, and the most played with so far. Excellent choice. We already have the Monster and the Detective Agency addition and its only Jan 4th :)
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kwiatkowski

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for a kindergarten or first grader
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for her sixth birthday it is perfect for her she’s using it she’s learning to read better
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Whole family fun
customer_reviews.text: Osmo is amazing. Our 6 and 8 year old are entertained and challenged enough to figure it out on their own, but not so much that they need me sitting there. So many different games. They have loved all of them. My husband and I have enjoyed playing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Smith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.  Many games not available--seeks purchase for more.
customer_reviews.text: Only minimal activities are actually available to the child. It takes the child to several other activities that look really cool but require even MORE money than already spent to add them. The initial system is expensive enough itself. Not intuitive to find or understand the activities. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dtjmfam11

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t know work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and returned it. I wanted it for spelling, but you can put the letters in any order and it’s still correct.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Tomczak

customer_reviews.title: Monster is their favorite..
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit expensive but decided to get it for my 6 and 4 year old for Christmas. They like it but do it’s not always their go-to ..monster and different studios are their favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set! I got this for my 6 year old and he will play with it all the time. It is so easy to use. I want to buy the other sets too
customer_reviews.author: Candis Shivers

customer_reviews.title: Don't wait
customer_reviews.text: I dont know why I waited so long to buy this. My kids love it and want to use it every day. You download individual apps for each game you buy. Super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! My son is actually interested in learning with this. The technology is great. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: LMW

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his osmo. It’s a really fun and learning game. I don’t know why I waited so long to buy it. You should try it.
customer_reviews.author: LadyJay23

customer_reviews.title: Merry Christmas grandmas bug
customer_reviews.text: This is gift for my little one for Christmas but of course Grandma had to take a peek. I think he’s going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: kathy patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter loved this! I got it for Xmas and she had so much fun doing the counting games and spelling.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the games she plays with them an hr a day
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was asking for one of those since you said in school. It was a great Christmas present
customer_reviews.author: Zailyn Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Fun and learning for hours
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves osmo. She plays for hours. She even got add on packs and loves those games too. I love how easy it is to store the stackable tubs that come with the kits.
customer_reviews.author: neverbeentospain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, easy to use, I highly recommend for children they play and learn at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Javier A.

customer_reviews.title: Good for children with special needs.
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be useable when a case is on the iPad. It is troubling that we have to take off the cover for use.
customer_reviews.author: warren

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my 10 y/o
customer_reviews.text: It is ok but not challenging for a 10 y/o. Best part is she likes to draw, so works awesome for that. .
customer_reviews.author: Grizzlym

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use all my kids love Osmo and learn
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use all my kids love Osmo and learn
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Alanis Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my nieces birthday.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nieces birthday. She got excited when she opened it. Can’t ask for anything more.
customer_reviews.author: Hko4

customer_reviews.title: 🤷‍♂️
customer_reviews.text: Wish it worked better with iPads in cases rather than have it to by their stupid case
customer_reviews.author: Chris Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great for 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit!!! Gave to my 6 year old for Christmas and she loves it. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: MoranMLZC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it. He learned several tricks right away. You get a lot of tricks with box.
customer_reviews.author: Janet johnston

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Such a good learning activity for the children! I love Osmo as do the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this product! I love how educational it is. Very easy to use and fun! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very good investment
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson for Christmas and he's 5 and he loves it a very good investment I watched him while he was doing some activities on it and he really enjoyed it
customer_reviews.author: sandy R

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for kids! Bought for daughter she loves the games and enjoy playing with her! Plus she learns and no need for internet connection makes it a big plus so it can be taken anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Structured creative learning
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice non-internet learning tool. If you are homeschooling a few it allows one child to learn on their own while you help the others. :)
customer_reviews.author: Steven Horvath

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it and keeps her entertained PLUS educated. A+
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter absolutely loved this product. Challenging, but she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: pollyplatypus

customer_reviews.title: Love the apps & pieces. Wish there was a protective case for base, mirror & pieces :)
customer_reviews.text: Loooove this learning tools for my 4 y.o! We have blast playing together. Great for math, problem solving, and critical thinking 🙌🏾 the only things missing is some sort of carry case or bag. We would love to travel with all the boxes; so having a carrying case would be nice especially to protect the base and the red mirror .
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Vengoechea

customer_reviews.title: the elect learning toy
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this ! a great way for learning and still having fun !
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. And my son does too. It’s easy to use and and Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S. Hernandez-Rojas

customer_reviews.title: For much younger kids!
customer_reviews.text: My son played with it for about 10 minutes and never played with it again. It’s easy to use and set up, but I think most kids are going to be too advanced to the ages it states
customer_reviews.author: Michael David Creighton

customer_reviews.title: Buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Keeps the kids guessing and learning. Fun to play
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Love how it comes with storage bins for the pieces

customer_reviews.title: My 5yr old Loves it!!

product_meta.title: Osmo - Genius Starter Kit for iPad - 5 Hands-On Learning Games - Ages 6-10 - Math, Spelling, Problem Solving, Creativity & More - (Osmo iPad Base Included), Multicolor
product_meta.description: Style:Genius Kit for iPadA great entry to the Osmo universe, the Genius Starter Kit for iPad includes everything your child needs to experience - hands-on learning and digital fun in five different ways through 5 games. We know kids learn by doing, so each game uses physical action. Whether it’s arranging tangrams, zooming number tiles around, over 150 word puzzles to discover, freehand drawing, or physics meets creative problem solving (Tangrams, Numbers, Words, Masterpiece & Newton Games), Osmo sees and reacts to every real-live move. Osmo games bring a child's creative imagination to life with hand held pieces that interact with an iPad and an Osmo Base (No WiFi necessary for game play). The Genius Starter Kit for iPad ships with an Osmo iPad Base. Approved by parents and teachers worldwide, used in over 31, 000 classrooms.
feature_bullets: OSMO IS MAGIC: Fun-filled & award winning learning games. Children interact with actual hand held pieces & an iPad, bringing a child's game pieces & actions to life (No WiFi necessary for game play). An Osmo Base is included, an iPad is not included, both are required for game play.

TEACHING: Arrange puzzle pieces to match on-screen shapes (Tangram), solve creative physics puzzles by drawing lines or placing items in front of the screen (Newton), learn to draw anything with creative drawing skills (Masterpiece), add, count & multiply tiles to pop the number bubbles (Numbers), learn spelling & vocabulary with on-screen images (Words).

SKILLS LEARNED: Visual problem-solving skills, puzzles, math, freehand drawing, gain listening skills, learn physics & improve spelling & vocabulary. Osmo sees and reacts to every real-life move. Geared towards children & love of learning.

AGE & CAPABILITY: Ages 6-10+. Games are designed for beginner to expert levels. Osmo enables the continuation of learning. Real-time audio and visual feedback lets children learn through experimentation in a stress-free environment.
WHAT'S IN THE BOX: Osmo Base & Reflector for iPad, Tangram pieces, Numbers tiles, Words tiles, Stackable storage for each game & 5 Game Apps: Numbers, Tangram, Words, Newton, and Masterpiece.
COMPATIBILITY FOR IPAD: All iPads except Generation 1, iPad Pro 11-inch and iPad Pro 12.9-inch. The minimum iOS version needed is iOS 9.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,531 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
